name: Vihta
description: A fresh birch whisk intensifies every burst of steam.
flavor: Leaves flutter across the benches like green confetti.

name: Kalja
description: Cold drinks keep visitors relaxed and willing to stay longer.
flavor: Foamy moustaches become badges of sauna honor.

name: Kossu
description: Stronger spirits inspire bold purchases and louder cheers.
flavor: One shot leads to another—and another upgrade.

name: Kiulu ja Kauha
description: Precision gear for flawless löyly throws every time.
flavor: The polished ladle gleams like a ceremonial relic.

name: Saunalakki
description: Heat-retaining hats help guests endure longer sessions.
flavor: Woolen peaks bob through the mist like tiny mountains.

name: Lämpömittari
description: Accurate readings keep the stove at peak efficiency.
flavor: The red line climbs with smug precision.

name: Burana
description: Pain relief keeps regulars returning for repeat sessions.
flavor: A calm sigh follows every offered tablet.

name: Saunatuoksu
description: Signature scents draw crowds eager for immersive steam.
flavor: Hints of pine and citrus swirl above the stones.

name: Saunaklonkku
description: A mischievous helper tends the coals with supernatural speed.
flavor: Glowing eyes peek between benches before vanishing again.

name: Uraanikivet
description: Experimental stones radiate unheard-of levels of heat.
flavor: Security insists nobody lick the gently glowing rocks.

name: Kamehameha
description: A legendary technique blasts water with cinematic flair.
flavor: Rumor claims the shockwave is audible from orbit.

name: Hawkingin Löylygeneraattori
description: Quantum breakthroughs turn black holes into steam engines.
flavor: Equations swirl in the air like glowing constellations.
